name: Czech Association for Branded Products
goal: The main objective of the Czech Association for Branded Products is to protect and support the common interests of branded products manufacturers in areas affecting the production, marketing, distribution and sale of branded products in the Czech Republic. Its members are primarily manufacturers and importers of branded FMCG.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: EU legislation - protection of intellectual property rights, fair trade relations, advertising and media, consumer protection, health protection, commodity legislation (food, alcohol beverages, infant food, cosmetics, detergents, tobacco products).
